companies.name: 10Life
companies.title: Lead Engineer
duties: I was responsible for back-end development tasks, including designing and implementing RESTful APIs, managing databases, and building an internal admin system.
I contributed to the implementation of automation testing on our CI/CD pipeline using Cypress.

companies.name: 10Life
companies.title: Software Engineer
duties: My main focus was on enhancing the website and mobile app, with a particular focus on developing new features, improving the UI/UX, and increasing the SEO performance.
I was involved in the development and maintenance of the AWS infrastructure, including services such as Amazon Lambda, CloudFront, EC2, RDS, Elastic Load Balancing, and others.
I collaborated closely with the development team to introduce new features and meet deadlines.

companies.name: Entinux
companies.title: Project Specialist
duties: Assisted project manager in managing the sim card registration system project, including filing issue reports, gathering information, and tracking developer progress.
Collaborated with other developers to develop a real-time map mobile app and admin console system by Ionic, Node.js, Handlebars.js, and MongoDB.
Developed a 24/7 network monitoring system app by Ionic, clients will receive alerts before server break-down and reach out to the support team for maintenance.
